SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.tcp.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.tcp.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Runnable, Remote
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable, VirtualServer
Thread that handles one tcp socket.

Client handler implements virtual server interface and acts as the virtual server for the bound client socket.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs this operation.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • connect

      public void connect(String nickname, VirtualClient client) throws IllegalStateException
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Subscribes the player to the server, putting them in a lobby if possible.

      Nicknames are unique and bind the client to the server. Therefore if a player is subject to an abnormal disconnection he must reconnect with the same nickname in order to reconnect.

      Specified by:
      connect in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique identifier of the user
      client - instance of the connecting client
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - the client is already connected;
      - the nickname passed is already in use;
      - the game reaches an illegal state of execution.

    • sendMsg

      public void sendMsg(String nickname, VirtualClient client, String addressee, String message)
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Sends a message to the specified addressee.

      Takes "all" as a parameter that broadcasts the message to every connected player.

      Specified by:
      sendMsg in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique identifier of the player, in this case also the messenger
      client - instance of the virtual client
      addressee - nickname of the message receiver
      message - text to be sent

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers(String nickname, VirtualClient client, int num)
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Sets the number of player required to play the match.
      Specified by:
      setNumOfPlayers in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique identifier of the user
      client - instance of the virtual client
      num - number of player to wait before starting the match

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String nickname, VirtualClient client) throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException, RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Unsubscribes the player from the server.

      The bind between the user and their identifier might or might not be released, depending on the stage of the match in which the user left.

      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique identifier of the user
      client - instance of the disconnecting client
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - nickname doesn't match any of the connected players' nicknames
      - a client instance not connected is trying to disconnect
      - game reaches an illegal state of execution.
      IllegalArgumentException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - nickname doesn't match any of the connected players' nicknames
      - an inner state exception
      RemoteException - if a connection error occurs

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(String nickname, VirtualClient client, char colour)
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Chooses the player's color.
      Specified by:
      chooseColor in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique id of the player
      client - instance of the virtual client
      colour - chosen colour

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(String nickname, VirtualClient client, int choice)
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Chooses the player secret objective between the available options.
      Specified by:
      chooseObjective in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique id of the player
      client - instance of the virtual client
      choice - index of the card to keep

      Specified by:

      Throws:

    • placeStartCard

      public void placeStartCard(String nickname, VirtualClient client, boolean placeOnFront)
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Places the starting card.
      Specified by:
      placeStartCard in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique identifier of the player
      client - instance of the virtual client
      placeOnFront - true if the face of the card is up, false if down

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String nickname, VirtualClient client, String cardID, int row, int col, String cornerDir, boolean placeOnFront) throws IllegalStateException
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Places the chosen card on the player's play area.

      The chosen card is placed on the corner selected by the user. The corner is represented with the point of the placed card containing the corner and its direction.

      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique id of the player
      client - instance of the virtual client
      cardID - id of the card to be placed
      row - position on the x-axis of the card containing selected the corner
      col - position on the y-axis of the card containing selected the corner
      cornerDir - direction of the selected corner
      placeOnFront - true if the face of the card is up, false if down
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame(String nickname, VirtualClient client, int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: VirtualServer
      Restarts the game with the given number of player
      Specified by:
      restartGame in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      nickname - unique id of the player
      client - instance of the virtual client
      numOfPlayers - number of player to wait before starting the match: if lower than the connected players at the time of the call the server will include all the connected players.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during connection
